content:
By default, the > appears before each line of quoted text when the reply is plain text format. Hold Shift when clicking Reply to switch to plain text if the default is HTML format.

The vertical lines can be hidden by checking 'Cleanup all level...' under 'Content formatting and cleanup' in the options for this add-on:

https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/replywithheader/

See also https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/quotecolors/
creator: sfhowes

content: If you have display set to "All" in View > Headers, then replies and forward will include the full message headers. Set to "normal" will help.
creator: wsmwk

content:
Make sure to allow cookies in *Thunderbird*. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/automatic-conversion-google-mail-accounts-oauth20

Also make sure nothing else on your computer is using TCP port 80, e.g. like a local web server. Also some sort of anti-virus software may block that port.

Do not use a VPN when authenticating with Gmail.
creator: christ1

content:
A quando risale l'ultimo backup di cui disponi? Inoltre, Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next
